oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ACTA programme
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ACTA (Association of technical and agricultural coordination) is an institution which funds projects in the agriculture field. Between year 2000 and 2004, 3 projects in Organic farming have been financed. (Others projects are financed together with INRA, this part is described in AgibioI and AgribioII). These 3 projects (financed only by ACTA) are described as projects, but also gathered and described as part of program (items 6626 and 6627) in the data basis.
